content: crochet this beautiful beginner-friendly blanket using basic stitches the vertical lines and luxurious tassels make this modern blanket a gorgeous touch to any home the willow blanket uses 8 balls of wool-ease thick & quick in lion brand yarn s 2021 color of the year called terracotta a 9 mm hook is used for the body of the blanket and a 10 mm hook is used for the border note that this blanket is worked with a very loose gauge to achieve light and airy stitches the free crochet pattern can be found *** here 1 *** 1 https //www allaboutami com/the-willow-blanket/
